title: Update Fail
body:
Was just in the game, all patched and ready, played a round previously. Leave the game to turn off peer to peer, and then the game doesn't work anymore and wont let me in cause "update fail" cause it totally needs to update some more. SO i turned it on and it still doenst work? riot have you considered putting a single dollar into not being garbage? would be nice instead of more splash art. thx

Guess my duo buddy will que without me :(

replies.body: There was a live service incident that occurred yesterday on NA that has since been resolved. Let me know if you're still having issues with this.

i just got this same exact issue. had the patch already, made me download it again for some reason yesterday after my lcient crashed in loading screen. I just playedf 5 games today and it crashed, now its trying to download the patch again and keeps saying failed, so i cant even log in.
Welp, guess its time to quit this trashy game. Don't feel like redownloading every time riots spaghetti code breaks.
